PerfectNetExp.abs: 「基本上,艺术创作就是个召唤的动作,就像描述事物,或像辨识出世界事物的原始实质再作转化工作, 这过程没有丝毫本质(quiddity)的遗漏」.依珊的创作也是将本质.
QUICKTRAN 快速翻译程序quiddity 本质；遁辞quiescence 静止；沉寂
n. 缓和,辩解,减轻 palliation n. 本质,实质,诡辩 quiddity n. 回答,答辩,答覆 rejoinder n. 辩护,拥护,辩明 vindication n.辩护者;为他人作证者 compurgator.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin quidditas, from Latin quid 'what'

means.word_mean: 1. an evasion of the point of an argument by raising irrelevant distinctions or objections
2. the essence that makes something the kind of thing it is and makes it different from any other
